channel.title: Kongregate highscores
channel.description:
Alright I play SAS 3: Zombie Assault on kongregate. Yeah it's pretty crappy but I like it. Recently, some kid that has a username of GraphicsVisual started playing. But he hacks the highscores. Just today he "got 7 billion kills" which is physically impossible as the game would crash way before that.. I know because I've used invincibility hacks and it always crashes on me..
I want to know if there is anyway to reset his kills in the highscores. They're on some remote mysql server (The swf game talks to a php file, the php file sends the data to A MySQL database)

item.title: Kongregate highscores
item.dc:creator: @SRBuckey5266 SRBuckey5266
item.description:
@SRBuckey5266 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:16, topic:529109”][quote author=SRBuckey5266 link=topic=647865.msg4358372#msg4358372 date=1378159212]
(Google Chrome) Press F12 and click on the network tab. Answer should be in there.

Or he’s just using cheat engine to modify his kill count.

[/quote]
Nah, NinjaKiwi (the devs for the game) has patched most Cheat Engine hacks.
It’s something with the data being sent over to the highscores in specific.[/quote]

I already told you the answer lies within F12 (but differs per browser, I think).

Read full topic

item.title: Kongregate highscores
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Muroth:

have you tried looking for the exploit? i.e adding ’ to a variable

I’m no Web dev, I was getting into the scene last year, but writing code for my RSPS (and others) was more important…

Read full topic

item.title: Kongregate highscores
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:11, topic:529109”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=647865.msg4357871#msg4357871 date=1378058423]

[quote author=Pwnd link=topic=647865.msg4357785#msg4357785 date=1378048383]

[quote author=runeite51 link=topic=647865.msg4357607#msg4357607 date=1378000528]

You’ll only be able to match his or get higher. Unless there’s an exploit, you won’t be able to remove his.
[/quote]I dunno, if he can send sql requests he can delete the whole table if he wanted to. Right?
[/quote]In theory, but it’d be retarded for such a large website to allow such a vulnerable exploit.

Even if you are able to get them to remove it, wouldn’t he just be able to exploit the highscores again since he just got “7 billion kills” today?

Well yes, but I’m sure they have a ban system that doesn’t allow him to be on the highscores, if not then them being able to remove the scores would be worthless.

Or they’d just fix the issue >.>

Kongregate do something right the first time? No.
[/quote]That’s why exposing the bug would be the second time :)[/quote]
I read on their forums to send an email to support@kongregate.com
I was like… So this has happen many of times, and many people called it out…
Yeah, they haven’t decided to fix it in years lol.

Read full topic
